title: "New Side Effect of COVID-19 Discovered: “Face Blindness”"
excerpt: "A Dartmouth College study discovered impairments in both face recognition and navigational abilities. A recent Dartmouth study published in the journal Cortex has revealed that COVID-19 can lead to difficulties in face recognition and navigation."
